annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Explicitly importing all from a module can lead to namespace pollution; consider importing only necessary components.
label: best_practice
reason: Explicitly importing all from a module can lead to namespace pollution; consider importing only necessary components.

annotation: 🧠 ML Signal: Using __all__ to control what is exported from a module is a common pattern.
label: ml_signal
reason: Using __all__ to control what is exported from a module is a common pattern.

annotation: ✅ Best Practice: Using += to extend __all__ ensures that all exports from imported modules are included.
label: best_practice
reason: Using += to extend __all__ ensures that all exports from imported modules are included.
